Class RandomColorSchemes.Brights

All Implemented Interfaces:
ColorScheme
Enclosing class:
RandomColorSchemes
public static class RandomColorSchemes.Brights
extends RandomColorSchemes

produces random Colors that are bright. These could be useful for line rendering. The Colors are defined using the HSB color model with the following restrictions:

      0 <= hue <= 1.0
      0.85 <= saturation <= 1.00
      0.40 <= brightness <= 0.60

See Also:
Color.getHSBColor(float, float, float)

getNext

public Color getNext()
Description copied from interface: ColorScheme
get the "next" color in the color scheme. This method returns a random color from within the scheme.
